summary.span: 所包含方法的泛型型別引數。

span.span: The generic type arguments of the contained method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當呼叫的方法是泛型方法時，才必須設定泛型型別引數。The generic type arguments must only be set if the called method is generic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 活動的 GenericTypeArguments。The following code sample demonstrates setting the GenericTypeArguments of an activity. 這個範例取自[使用 InvokeMethod 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. summary.span: 活動執行時要叫用之方法的名稱。

span.span: The name of the method to be invoked when the activity executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所叫用的方法必須宣告為公用。The invoked method must be declared as public. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 活動的 MethodName 屬性。The following code sample demonstrates setting the MethodName property of an activity. 這個範例取自[使用 InvokeMethod 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As Collection(Of Argument)

summary.span: 要叫用之方法的參數集合。

span.span: The parameter collection of the method to be invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將參數加入至集合時，加入順序必須與參數出現在方法簽章中的順序相同。The parameters must be added to the collection in the same order that they appear in the method signature. 參數不能命名為`TargetObject`或`Result`。Parameters cannot be named `TargetObject` or `Result`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 活動的 Parameters。The following code sample demonstrates setting the Parameters of an activity. 這個範例取自[使用 InvokeMethod 活動](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md)範例。This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值指出是否要以非同步方式叫用活動的方法。
